channel.title: Does anyone know how to turn a video into a .wav file? (Extracting audio)
channel.description: I have a video that I’d like to make samples out of. Does anyone know how to extract the audio from it?

item.title: Does anyone know how to turn a video into a .wav file? (Extracting audio)
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
lol if u were on desktop i was just gonna suggest changing the file type to wav instead of mp4 or whatever the video is in.
at least that’s what u can do on mac and it works.

item.source: Does anyone know how to turn a video into a .wav file? (Extracting audio)

item.title: Does anyone know how to turn a video into a .wav file? (Extracting audio)
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Desktop or mobile?

On desktop, grab Audacity. Open the video file in Audacity. It’ll extract and open just the audio, which you can then export in a range of audio formats.

Mobile - an app like iConv. I think iMovie and GarageBand will also work.

Read full topic
